      static RegexExpression StringExpressions.regexFind​(Expression input)
      Applies a regular expression (regex) to a string and returns information on the first matched substring.
      static RegexExpression StringExpressions.regexFindAll​(Expression input)
      Applies a regular expression (regex) to a string and returns information on the all matched substrings.
      static RegexExpression StringExpressions.regexMatch​(Expression input)
      Applies a regular expression (regex) to a string and returns a boolean that indicates if a match is found or not.
